name: Space Hero (Games Star)
description:
Hello,

This game name is Space Hero which is developed by Game Star Studio.

How to play :

In this game, many aliens are coming from space, and played will avoid this by moving left and right.

bug: 

Though this game is under development, so you can't select another character. so in this game, there will have a default character. (We will try to fix it soon) 

Sorry for that.

Thank you,
From Games Star Studio
